channel.title: Facepalm lost trade
channel.description:
well. I was fixing dupes and I've did it so good I've lost trade! haha.
Anyway I somehow lost trade from the player menu, right click a player, trade is gone. =|
I'm sorry but this is face palm but can someone help me? I don't know what I did.

item.title: Facepalm lost trade
item.dc:creator: @teken2 teken2
item.description:
@teken2 wrote:

Wow thank you for the help guys I hope it works. =)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2010, 05:15:58 pm[/size][hr]Hmm, quick question, if it doesn’t work say the other options like attack or trade, why wouldn’t the options work?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2010, 09:42:16 am[/size][hr]Do you know?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2010, 10:32:16 am[/size][hr]Dem I can’t fix it. =(

Read full topic

item.title: Facepalm lost trade
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

To make options show up, you would call this in the run method:

          setOption(3, "Trade");

You might need this method:

void setOption(int slot, String text) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(slot); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString(text); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

Read full topic
